episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics, including archery competitions held on a rubbish heap, the inventor of the electric blanket who also created a device to deter squirrels, a sea harbor in Uzbekistan now far from the sea due to ecological changes, and the use of a robot to explore wombat burrows.

facts.fact: In the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, archers competed on top of a rubbish heap.
The man who invented the electric blanket also invented a device to electrocute squirrels to keep them off his bird feeder.
There's a sea harbour in Uzbekistan that's 150 kilometres from the sea.
Wombat burrows can be explored by a special robot called a wombot.
